text:
Hi, everyone.
I'm currently working on replicating data from HubSpot to BigQuery, have you ever seen some article on this or maybe some 3rd party instruments that really works for all the data, not just crm + cms + email marketing?
usually I see no social posts statistics.

Good evening, we need to integrate HubSpot Api in our application so that we created an app in developer account, we have trouble in the Oauth 2.0 for install the app in test account . here is my HubSpot App install URL ex: (<https://app-eu1.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=xxxxxxxx--xxxxx&redirect_uri=https://19df-182-66-104-114.ngrok-free.app/connector/v1/HubSpot/callback&scope=oauth%20integration-sync%20tickets%20e-commerce%20communication_preferences.read_write%20crm.objects.contacts.read%20crm.objects.companies.read%20crm.objects.deals.read%20crm.objects.line_items.read>
) if redirect URL is my *ngrok url* means iâ€™m able to getting Oauth response but I change the redirect url as *my domain (<https://domainurl/connector/v1/HubSpot/callback)url>* is not working .

could you pleae suggest me ...
thanks for the respone
Make sure you have updated the Install URL / Redirect URLs on the Auth tab of your Public App in your Developer account to use your domain url.
Also please refrain from posting the same question to multiple channels.

thank you for response. sorry for that posting into multiple channel.
We added new url in the redirection column in Auth tab, even though its not working for me.
